pkgmetadata.longdescription: Seasonal Adjustment of Weekly Data // Perform seasonal adjustment of weekly data. The package provides a user-friendly interface for computing seasonally adjusted estimates of weekly data and includes functions for the creation of country-specific prior adjustment variables, as well as diagnostic tools to assess the quality of the adjustments. The method is described in more detail in Ginker (2023) doi:10.13140/RG.2.2.12221.44000.
